name: prello
description: Project manager based on boards, list and cards

scripts.test: cd server && npm test && cd ../client && npm test
scripts.install:all:prod: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "cd server && npm install --production" " cd client && npm install --production"
scripts.install:all:dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail "cd server && npm install" " cd client && npm install"
